amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the appropriation for mass transit operating assistance grants by $135 million and rescind an additional $135 million from the Airport and Airway Trust Fund facilities and equipment account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record that rescinds an additional $135 million from the Facilities and Equipment Account of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund; and increases by $135 million the amount for Formula Grants of the Federal Transit Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foglietta amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 295 (Roll no. 559).
